attributes.action: Introduce National ID cards for all UK adult citizens
attributes.additional_details: I feel it would make the UK a more safer place if we knew if our neighbours were here legally
attributes.background: With the influx of foreign nationals into the UK of late, the issuing of a National ID card for all adult citizens would make the job of the police and immigration agency a lot easier to determine and persons immigration status instantly.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637803
